role_definition: The Servicing Event History service domain captures the details of servicing activity to support root cause analysis. The information captured can include summary details of the servicing activity, product access details and clickstream/voice records as necessary. The captured detail can be analyzed for staff assessment and training and to support procedural refinements
example_of_use: A servicing contact is concluded and the contact details and result is captured. In cases the call is recorded
executive_summary: This service domain captures, classifies and stores servicing activity and events to support root cause analysis
key_features: Log customer servicing event activity for the representative
Log servicing issues and other activity
list_of_scenarios: Review Call Centre Activity for New Product
Process Inventory of Cash and Distribution of Cash to Branches
End Mobile Access Session and Update Event and Servicing and Channel History
